conbody.p:
The is a server component that is an exact copy of the running in a headless non-GUI mode. It is a key component to perform continuous integration with . The
supports several modes: Server, Interactive Shell and Scripting.

The primary purpose is to generate Java code, compile and package job binaries for deployment onto the Job Conductor within the . It is always invoked through commands which can be sent to it. The same commands can be used as part of a shell scripting approach.
The generally runs as a service on the same server as and/or the CI Environment (for example Jenkins, Bamboo, etc.)
